name: Logarithm Labs
headline: Easy button to use data for your daily operations
description:
Easy button to use data for your daily operations. Power your business workflows with quality data.

Logarithm Labs helps you turn manual data wrangling and ad-hoc scripts into repeatable pipelines for your operational workflows. Power your workflows with quality data.

Our product and team of experts do the heavy lifting so that can focus on the business logic that drives your organization.

To learn more, contact us at hello@logarithmlabs.com.

founders.name: Puneet Jagralapudi, Founder
founders.description: Ex-Product Manager; Led solutions & GTM at Google Cloud for compute, storage, analytics, and vertical solutions, M&A and strategy at LSI CTO's office

founders.name: Avishek Panigrahi, Founder
founders.description:
I have ~20 years of experience in chip design, compute/data infrastructure, and CAD/automation working at Google, Xilinx, Samsung MIPS.

At Logarithm Labs, we accelerate complex engineering development by making engineering data usable and actionable. We're starting with chip design.

#  Usable data from messy silos, without requiring a dedicated team
Get started now
## Quality data, right where you need it
We set up and manage data pipelines so that you have clean, transformed data without needing a dedicated data engineering team.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba65461a6ef97cb79_Group%20474.svg)
##### **White Glove Onboarding**
Get up and running within 2 weeks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba654616fcb97cb74_Group%20472.svg)
##### **Managed Data Infrastructure**
We run your data pipelines end-to-end
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61b7f91a45399d76ff6e3f3a_Loglabs%20Website%20Graphics%20-%20Splash.svg)
## **Shift focus to your business logic**
No more data janitorial work; simply script your business rules or define your decision logic in a table and we take care of the rest
Schedule a free consultation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba65461392497cb09_Group%20898.svg)
No credit card necessary
## **Offload data gruntwork**
Wrangling clean & usable data from spreadsheets, internal DBs, and SaaS apps sucking up your time?Automating it requires a data engineering team and dedicated infrastructure, but assembling one can take months.
Our team of experts and technology building blocks can help you get started on your journey towards data-driven operations.[Reach out to us to learn more.](http://www.logarithmlabs.com/<https:/calendly.com/loglabs/free-consultation>)
## **Use Cases**
Whether you're just starting a new project or need help scaling, we can help streamline your data-driven workflows
Contact Us
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba654612f8a97cb07_Group%20879.svg)
#### **Workflow Automation**
Starting a new process automation initiative but don't have a dedicated data team? Our fully managed approach can help you get there in the shortest time.
Learn more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba654610a8897cb08_Group%20894.svg)
#### **Customer Engagement**
From segmentation & audience building, to attribution & lead scoring, grow your business with fresh and usable data at your fingertips.
Learn more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba654617bbe97cb62_Group%20701-min.png)
#### **Data Onboarding & Ingest**
Get quality data from those messy spreadsheets & datasets for master data management to customer data onboarding and everything in between.
Learn more
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba6546198c997cb4e_Group%20903.png)
#### **Operational Dashboards**
Power your operational analytics needs by bringing together data from all of your internal systems and data sources with minimal effort.
Learn more
## **Rolling your own data stack is time consuming.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61b0cf041c60312ed3434a83_wordcloud-square.png)
The market is packed with tools, technologies, and open source libraries. Navigating them to set up reliable and maintainable pipelines for data driven workflows can suck up valuable time.Leave the heavy lifting to us instead, so that you can focus on what really moves the needle for your business.‍
Register for our Technology Decision Matrix
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61b7f8b1fad1dbaa93ff0122_Loglabs%20Website%20Graphics.svg)
## **Solutions, Not Stacks**
Simply write your core business logic in Python, SQL, or Shell scripts and deploy. Or, if you don't have the technical team, [our experts can help you get set up](http://www.logarithmlabs.com/<https:/www.logarithmlabs.com/#engagement-model>).Our fully integrated solution includes UIs, scheduling, integrations, RBAC, and everything else needed to create managed data pipelines and workflows. 
Learn more
##### Features :
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba65461392497cb09_Group%20898.svg)
App & data templates
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba65461392497cb09_Group%20898.svg)
Auth & Access Control
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba65461392497cb09_Group%20898.svg)
Simplified scheduling
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba65461392497cb09_Group%20898.svg)
Python, SQL & YAML support
## **Integrations for all your** key data sources
We bring together the best of open source and commercial integration tools to address your most complex requirements
[Explore All](http://www.logarithmlabs.com/<#integrations>)

## Onboarding process
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba654612c2d97cb10_Vector-6.svg)
#### 1. Define
Assess quality and availability of data sources, map to desired outcomes, and create plan of action
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba65461664b97cbe0_Group%20938.svg)
#### 2. Solve
We work as an extension of your team and help you with rapid solution development
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61ae5d2aa6546150f697cad0/61ae5d2ba6546183a697cb04_Group%2062.svg)
#### 3. Manage
No maintenance headaches; our managed workflows & pipelines ensure you're always up and running
## **Result: automated decisions, powered by quality data**
Streamline and automate your data-intensive workflows so that you can meet your business objectives without pain.
#### [**Fast time-to-market; up and running within 15 days** We ensure you have the support you need to get started.](http://www.logarithmlabs.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)#### [**Prioritize and adapt your data to shifting business needs** Our team of experts can help you iteratively build out the capabilities you need in-house.](http://www.logarithmlabs.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)#### [**Make effective decisions with fresh and accurate data** Automated workflows to get the latest data right where you need it.](http://www.logarithmlabs.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)

"Our team is looking at a consolidated dashboard everyday. Much more useful than running ad-hoc scripts each time"
"Within a week, we were up and running and were able to deliver impact across multiple teams within our organization."

generated_description:
### Logarithm Labs: Your Easy Button for Data

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's W20 batch, Logarithm Labs is on a mission to simplify the complexities of data management in business operations. Located in Foster City, CA, and with a small but mighty team of two, their core offering is a robust solution designed to transform manual data wrangling into efficient, repeatable workflows. 

#### The Problem They Solve

Every business struggles with data silos—messy, uncoordinated data that can take up your team's valuable time. Logarithm Labs addresses this issue head-on by enabling companies to manage their data pipelines without the need for a dedicated, specialized team. Their claim is simple: you provide the business logic, and they handle the data grunt work.

#### How They Do It

Using a combination of technology and expertise, Logarithm Labs helps businesses automate their data workflow processes. Here’s the breakdown:

1. **Setup and Management**: They manage your data pipelines, ensuring that you get clean, transformed data quickly—often within two weeks.
   
2. **Integration**: Their technology integrates with various data sources, allowing you to consolidate and make sense of disparate datasets with ease.

3. **User-Friendly Interfaces**: With tools that support Python, SQL, and YAML, you can focus on writing business rules instead of getting bogged down with the underlying infrastructure.

4. **Expert Support**: Even if your team isn’t data-savvy, Logarithm Labs has the experts to help you with onboarding and ongoing management.

#### Use Cases

Whether you're looking to automate workflows, improve customer engagement, manage data onboarding, or create operational dashboards, Logarithm Labs has a tailored solution. They promise to take care of the heavy lifting so you can concentrate on your core business priorities.

#### Why Choose Logarithm Labs?

For businesses overwhelmed by the noise of messy data, Logarithm Labs acts as a clean slate—providing quality data right where you need it, with minimal delay and maintenance concerns. With a fast onboarding process and commitment to quality, they remove much of the pain typically associated with data management.

For more information or to kick off a consultation, reach out at [hello@logarithmlabs.com](mailto:hello@logarithmlabs.com) or check their website at [logarithmlabs.com](http://www.logarithmlabs.com).

#### Final Thought

In a world where data is the new oil, Logarithm Labs is the refiner, turning raw, crude data into high-octane insights that drive your business forward without the usual headaches. If you're looking to evolve your operational workflows, it might be time to hit that “easy button.”
